entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: Gilderoy Lockhart is a person mentioned in the text as he is talking to Seamus Finnigan about freshly caught Cornish pixies. He is described as dramatic and waggling his finger at Seamus.

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: Seamus Finnigan is a person mentioned in the text as he is talking to Gilderoy Lockhart about freshly caught Cornish pixies. He lets out a snort of laughter and is described as choking.

entities.name: cornish pixies
entities.description: Cornish pixies are creatures mentioned in the text as they are being talked about by Gilderoy Lockhart and Seamus Finnigan. They are described as electric blue, eight inches high, with pointed faces and shrill voices.

relationships.description: Gilderoy Lockhart has freshly caught Cornish pixies as he is talking to Seamus Finnigan.
Seamus Finnigan is talking to Gilderoy Lockhart about freshly caught Cornish pixies.
